channel.title: Digital Logic, Discrete Math on Pranavi Boyalakuntla
channel.description: Recent content in Digital Logic, Discrete Math on Pranavi Boyalakuntla

item.title: VLSI Circuit Optimization Using Discrete Math
item.description: I looked into how to represent MOS transistor circuits as logic graphs and implemented an algorithm to simplify these logic graphs. This allows the MOS transistor layouts in silicon to be optimized. (Full Paper)
